name: Airui
tagline: express lairui's ideas. Though they will expire everynow
body:
### Welcome to lairui's Pages.
hello everyone.

About me: I am a person who want to express everything everynow in which processing every rolling out of stable status.

```
$ cd your_repo_root/repo_name
$ git fetch origin
$ git checkout gh-pages
```

What I am focus

### Random
Before display the stage, I set up a framework using "Xiang Di zhi Xian".
Then, every item can get a fitable chance to the front.

### Endless
The scene where to display things is not same to the place where the brain runs. So the endless can be reached.

### Authors and Contributors
You can @Songlairui  at weibo

### Support or Contact
